sentences.en: History will characterise all these transactions as insane.
sentences.cn: 历史将判定所有这些做法是属于疯狂行为.

sentences.en: It depends on the mix of investment strategies that characterise the market.
sentences.cn: 它取决于市场所特有的投资策略的组合.

sentences.en: It'shows how stochastic and deterministic trends characterise long - run behaviour of Taipei house prices.
sentences.cn: 本研究以随机性与确定性的趋势成份来展现台北地区住宅价格 长期 的变动行为.

sentences.en: Secondly, we characterise premium rate mobile message services and examine their emergence.
sentences.cn: 其次, 我们的特色保险费率手机短信息服务和研究,它们的出现.

sentences.en: The purpose of the study is to characterise 101 cases of pulmonary acariasis patients.
sentences.cn: 本文总结了101例肺螨病患者的临床表现、胸部X线 特征及用甲硝达唑治疗结果.

sentences.en: Then there is the Web Ontology Language ( OWL ), which provides a way to characterise objects.
sentences.cn: 接着就是开发万维网实体论语言 ( OWL ), 这种语言为给对象定性提供了解决方案.

words.tran_cn: 典型的；特有的；表示特性的
无个性的；缺乏特征的；平凡的
性格，品质；特性；角色；[计] 字符
描绘…的特性；具有…的特征
